channel.title: git on tomis9's cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in git on tomis9's cookbook

item.title: git
item.description: 1. What is git and why would you use it? Git is a totally basic program if you think seriously about programming. Seriously. It’s a version control system, which makes: working on the same project with many people simple; remembers the whole history of the projects, i.e. all it’s chages as long as you follow git’s discipline 2. A “Hello world” example As you may have noticed, my posts usually contain a section called ‘A “Hello World” example’, but not this time.
